channel.title: Steam error
channel.description:
Whenever I try to run steam I get this message:
''Could not connect to Steam network. Either the Steam network is currently not running, or your internet connection is down. Please check your internet connection and try again.'' Wheb I press OK I get this:
''Runtime error!
Program: C:\Program Files\Steam\Steam.exe
This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way. Please contact the application's support team for for information''
Steam worked fine a couple of days go. I have never downloaded anything strange or edited steam in any way.

item.title: Steam error
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
deleting steam.dll and steamclient.dll helps sometimes

Read full topic

item.title: Steam error
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
It worked for me, but it’s more to help specific steam apps than steam itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam error
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
MaxTheLimit:

search your hard drive for:

winsta.dll
shimeng.dll
setupapi.dll
wtsapi32.dll

and copy them into program files\steam

then copy the file engine.dll located in
program files\steam\steamapps<profile>\half-life 2\bin

to the following directory:
program files\steam

Did that help at all?

I don’t know how that would supposed to help but I tried it anyway. It didn’t work. I think I’ll have reinstall then. :-/

Edit: Nevermind guys, I reinstalled steam and it works now!

Read full topic

I had a similar problem with steam but re-registering worked fine.

item.title: Steam error

item.description:
Ok I just tried that but it didn’t seem to fix the problem. Any other things I can try?

item.title: Steam error
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
You may try to delete the “ClientRegistry.blob” in your Steam executable’s folder. This usually fixes all problems. (You may have to type in your login and password again after doing this)

Read full topic

item.title: Steam error
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
Whenever I try to run steam I get this message:

‘‘Could not connect to Steam network.
Either the Steam network is currently not running, or your internet connection is down. Please check your internet connection and try again.’’
Wheb I press OK I get this:

''Runtime error!

Program: C:\Program Files\Steam\Steam.exe

This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way.
Please contact the application’s support team for for information’’

Steam worked fine a couple of days go. I have never downloaded anything strange or edited steam in any way.
